com.github.ilyes4j.gwt.mdl.components.ripples

Interface HasRipple

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Button, ButtonBase, Checkbox, CheckboxBase, CheckBoxStyleOperator, Flip, FlipStyleOperator, RadioButton, RadioStyleOperator, ToggleStyleOperator

    public interface HasRipple
    Material components with a ripple effect must implement this interface.
    Author:
    Mohamed Ilyes DIMASSI

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ripple getRipple()
      Returns whether this component have a ripple.
      void setRipple(Ripple ripple)
      indicate whether this component should have a ripple.

    • Method Detail

      • setRipple

        void setRipple(Ripple ripple)
        indicate whether this component should have a ripple.
        Parameters:
        ripple - the ripple option to be applied to the component

      • getRipple

        Ripple getRipple()
        Returns whether this component have a ripple.
        Returns:
        the ripple option applied to the component
